extendedIngredients.name: pine nuts
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3/4 cup chopped walnuts or pine nuts, toasted

recipes.title: Spinach-Basil Pesto
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                Place garlic in a food processor; pulse until finely chopped. Add spinach, basil and walnuts. Pulse until chopped. Add cheese, salt and pepper. Continue processing while gradually adding oil in a steady stream.                                        Yield: 1-3/4 cups.                                                                                                     Freeze option:  Freeze pesto in freezer containers. To use, thaw in refrigerator.                                                                                                Originally published as Spinach-Basil Pesto in  Taste of HomeSeptember/October 2013, p3-7                                                                                                                                                                                                       Nutritional Facts                                                                             2 tablespoons equals 167 calories, 17 g fat (3 g saturated fat), 5 mg cholesterol, 177 mg sodium, 2 g carbohydrate, 1 g fiber, 3 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: Place garlic in a food processor; pulse until finely chopped.
Add spinach, basil and walnuts. Pulse until chopped.
Add cheese, salt and pepper. Continue processing while gradually adding oil in a steady stream.
